nodes.text: Exum Jermit was a male Muun who served as Second Vice Chair of the InterGalactic Banking Clan and frequented the Malastare Hunting Club, who would treat him lavishly for his loyalty to them. Around 3 ABY, Jermit refused to do business with Jabba the Hutt in favor of doing business with a mysterious competitor of Jabba's. In response, Jabba sent his majordomo, Bib Fortuna, to try to persuade Jermit to reconsider. Jermit spoke with Fortuna during the Great Hunt of Malastare, but still refused. In response to his refusal, Fortuna allowed the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk to kill Jermit, as he had been hired to do by Jabba.
